Reviews.Title: Works as advertised
Reviews.Author: shu
Reviews.Content: We began our experience with security cameras about three months ago with two Foscam FI8905W's behind the house.  They were easy to program, gave a decent image, and seemed well built for the price, but near objects at night were totally whited-out by the IR illumination.  We bought this FI8904W, with a shorter illumination range and wider view angle, for the front of the house.The mounting brackets Foscam provides are pretty much a joke, so we use "mending straps" (strips of steel about 1 x 4 inches, come in a blister pack of four with some wood screws in the hardware department) to hang them under the eves of the house.

Reviews.Title: Great product and great support
Reviews.Author: Mr A J Baker
Reviews.Content: Purchased this item for my mum for Christmas so she could watch the wildlife in the garden on her iPad.  The product it'self is well made and as its an outside camera I'm glad it looks so solid.  All brackets and connections are provided as well.Once I'd installed the program on the PC to set up the camera (which is all pretty straight forward), I had a problem with connecting wirelessly.  I called the local Foscam number off the internet which put me through to a Technical Support guy and within a few minutes had resolved the issue (which was on my PC not the camera) and I was wirelessly watching the garden.As the title says a great product and great support as well.  Well done Foscam!

Reviews.Title: the worst camera ever made
Reviews.Author: liuber garcia
Reviews.Content: i spend 5 hours to setup the camera an then the software don't record whit iOS for iMac you only can see the camera then i try whit a windows 8 and don't work the record button appear but you click on it an don't work the video got a good quality day and night

Reviews.Title: should be POSCAM
Reviews.Author: David McNeill
Reviews.Content: I have purchased six POSCAMs from Amazon. I have three F18903W,two F18904W and one F18910W. The 03Ws are POS. One has LEDs failed and replaced by Amazon supplier, one was credited by Amazon and one just LED failed tonight. The 04W is working (one week) with good color an function, the second 04W has not been installed and the 10W is an inside camera with tilt and pan and functions properly when used intermittently. Never buy them from anyone but FOSCAM (even if via Amazon) because although the box says one year warranty no one will honor the warranty (not yet verified) unless purchased directly from FOSCAM. The 03Ws were purchased through Amazon and all failed within six months; only one 04W and one 10W are presently working. One the positive side , when they work they were relatively easy to setup. The 03Ws have been withdrawn from the market

Reviews.Title: Foscam warranty
Reviews.Author: abuilder2
Reviews.Content: This camera worked in the wireless mode for about 1 month.  I contacted Foscam and they gave me a list of issues to try.  Nothing restored the wireless capability.  I would rate the non-wireless performance at about 5 on a scale of 10. The camera was shown to have a warranty for 1 year.  I requested a RMA number after about 4 months.  The delay was caused because I decided to change out my router to make sure it was a camera problem.  Foscam advised me the camera warranty had expired.  I pointed out the paperwork said the camera had a 1 year warranty.  Silence.  I would not purchase a camera from Foscam.

Reviews.Title: Works great
Reviews.Author: CharleyChicago
Reviews.Content: I have one of these on my front porch to keep an eye on my front yard.  It works like a champ.  It is not difficult to set up if you are familiar with IP addressing.  The image is clear and reliable and the night vision works well enough to clearly see people walking by 30 feet away.  I purchased a Loftek camera for the back of my house and I am going to junk it and purchase another one of these.  The only problem I had was in trying to use the motion detection.  It worked fine during the day, but at night moths would fly by in front of the camera and set off the motion detection.  I collected thousands of pictures of insects but no intruders.  I finally just turned off motion detection after dark.

Reviews.Title: Software no what they say
Reviews.Author: Jeff Sloan "Kbletvdoc"
Reviews.Content: I like the camera and it's super easy to setup, I can see this camera almost any where, but it will not alert me. I have set and reset many many times but it will not do what they advertise. I also bought a indoor camera it setup and emails me and is awesome. But if you are looking to use the alert fuction of this camera you better checkout another brand. But if your just wanting to see something this works ok and it will record the alarms to a folder.

Reviews.Title: Nice Camera
Reviews.Author: JRH952
Reviews.Content: I have 2 of these cameras. They work fine with good day and night video. They are NOT $500 cameras so don't expect perfection.Yes the colors are off in daylight due to infrared and no True day/night filter. Do some research before you buy andyou won't be expecting more than you can get for this price.John

Reviews.Title: very good buy
Reviews.Author: Adrian
Reviews.Content: i bought this camera 1 year ago..it's working perfect!for the price it was the best.now i took another one :):)working very good, easy set up (just follow the manual, no need to much IT science, you can find on the net a lot of information if encounter any issues), easy to connect and to operate!very good buy

Reviews.Title: Great outdoor camera
Reviews.Author: Stephen E. Johnson
Reviews.Content: This camera works really good!  Easy to set up and I access it and other Foscam cameras from my Blackberry 8330. Piece-of-cake!

Reviews.Title: Camera died after 3 months: IR always on, flickering image
Reviews.Author: Christophe Testi
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera directly from the manufacturer.Installation and setup was not too bad, and the image quality was pretty decent while the camera was working.But after 1 week I noticed I could not access the camera anymore, so I had to do hard reboot, same thing happened on average once a week. The camera is installed right next to my wireless router, so this is not a signal strength issue.Then recently, I noticed the Infra Red lights would be always on, giving this funny looking IR image during day light. And to make things worse, the image is now constantly flickering, going from bright to dark, even after multiple reboot.Camera does not seem to be very reliable; I'll update my review once I hear back from Foscam support.

Reviews.Title: Terrible
Reviews.Author: Henk ten Hoope
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera together with the FI8905W and two indoor foscam cameras in March.The indoor cameras are fantastic but these outdoor cameras are worthless.First off, there is no way to turn off the infrared which causes daytime image to be gray or black and white appearing.No color to speak of.  I figured I can live with that.September, the outdoor cameras stopped working.  The adapter doesn't appear to get power (the light is not on).Support is practically non-existent.I will never buy these foscam outdoor cameras again.  The indoor ones are absolutely fantastic.

Reviews.Title: Fake!
Reviews.Author: Peter Freeborn
Reviews.Content: I have 3 Foscam's already and one of them is this model.  I guess I was naive to think that this would be the same for $40 less.The camera has noticeable degraded video quality and has very bad night vision.  I hope I will be able to return the product.

Reviews.Title: Can't shut IR off - Colors messed up during day
Reviews.Author: Abe Lincoln
Reviews.Content: This camera is a pretty good quality build - good materials, feels solid, and is definitely worthy of the outdoor label.  I don't believe it's a genuine Foscam - it appears to be a knockoff, though a pretty decent one.  The 24 IR lamps light up the evening like it's daytime - I can see my entire front yard & driveway perfectly clear at night.  The only problem is I can't see any way to turn the IR lights off, and they don't shut off automatically during the day.  This results in a very strange picture during the day - still of high quality and sharpness, but it looks like something from another planet with green and purple colors (though mostly black & white), and my green plants look like snow.  This may not bother you if you're just using it for security, but be aware that you won't be seeing in color during the day. This is a huge oversight on this camera, which may or may not be related to the fact that it's not a genuine Foscam.  I'm going to return this camera and pay $15 more for the genuine one which actually says in the description that it has "auto IR lamps", and hope that fixes it.  Otherwise, this is a decent camera for the money.

Reviews.Title: Foscam F18904 Outdoor Camera
Reviews.Author: Daniel S. Jablonoski
Reviews.Content: Price is good for outdoor cam. Setup of the camera is fair but lacks significant tools. Motion detection tool must use full screen detection rather then single movable point detection. IP function only works for multiple single frame stills recordings. Videos can only be recorded to local hard drives or needs to go though computer to mapped drives. Can not save videos directly to NAS drives via IP address through the router (Very important and common feature for wireless security cameras) Pigtail on the back of the camera is awkward to work with. Camera mount kind of minimum, should have been beefier. For the price you get what you pay for. I don't recommend this camera, it is more trouble then it is worth.

Reviews.Title: Decent Camera
Reviews.Author: user
Reviews.Content: This camera works fine.  The setup is very easy if you have any networking experience.  I recommend setting a static IP on the camera, so you don't have to worry about it ever changing, just make sure to set your gateway and DNS settings to the ip address of your router.  The wide angle lens is a must, make sure to find one with the 3.6mm lens. It will give you a 67 degree field of view versus the normal 22 degree.  I have had these on the roof for a few weeks now and the wireless network has been fine and worked well.  Make sure to test your settings after setup indoor before you install it just to make sure it's configured correctly before you make it less accessible!  If you are looking for something that is fully functional and not pro grade (read: expensive!) these are perfect.  I do not recommend the FI8909W at all, I could not get it to connect through wifi consistently.  I have also had good luck with the FI8908W now that there is new firmware that allows the camera to keep it's position after a power failure or reset.

Reviews.Title: Disappointed
Reviews.Author: w4mic
Reviews.Content: I've read good reviews, and I have other Foscam Cameras that work fine.However, this unit failed out of the box, and I have went through HELL trying to get it replaced.After 6 phone calls, two emails, and 4 failed attempts at reaching a "Customer Service Rep" through their Online Chat system,I was FINALLY informed that Foscam's position is that since the unit is under 30 days old, they WILL NOT warranty the item."Instead," they told me, "You need to return the product to Amazon.  They will send you a new one."The problem is, I contacted Amazon; and found that they CANNOT just "send you a new one."Because the product is shipped via third party vendor (i.e: Foscam), they do not provide warranty replacement (by contract);all they can do is refund your money.  This is NOT Amazon's fault or problem; the vendor sent me a bad camera,but they (Foscam) placed the burden of replacement on a retailer who cannot replace it.Ummm...  WHAT?!?!Ultimately, I just accepted my loss and Amazon refunded the cost of my camera.The girl on the phone was very nice and understanding, but her hands were tied.Now, I have no camera, waiting for my refund, and I will STILL have to shop for, purchase, and wait for the deliver of another camera.I think I will shop Foscam's competition a bit.  Their customer service sucks.Simple.Foscam FI8904W Outdoor Wireless/Wired IP Camera with 15-20 Meter Night Vision and 6mm Lens (67° Viewing Angle) - Silver

Reviews.Title: Horrible image quality and poor WIFI
Reviews.Author: BlueJay
Reviews.Content: When it's on WIFI, the image is not stable. Sometimes it looks like a picture with unwanted artistic effect in PhotoShop. Another bigger problem is that when I put it outside on my balcony, it loses WIFI right away. At the same spot, the WIFI shows good strength on my laptop and iPhone. it's totally useless and I will have to take extra time to package it up and return it. Not sure it's an issue with FOSCAM development team or the QC team. Very bad.

Reviews.Title: No service
Reviews.Author: Triggerman
Reviews.Content: I can see both cameras on my network, but I can't see them away from my net work. I contacted tech support and they farm me off to Se company that wanted to sell me their product. I am sending both foscam cameras back

Reviews.Title: This wireless connection is problematic.
Reviews.Author: DD "D.D."
Reviews.Content: I was lucky enough to get the wireless to work on this product exactly one month and four days.  Which is four days past the date the item was eligible under the return policy.  Now it only works when connected via the wired network.  I tried every option recommended on their website, including an upgrade to the firmware.

Reviews.Title: Good camera when it works...
Reviews.Author: Russ J
Reviews.Content: Image is good for cameras in this price range and night vision works well.  Beware of Foscam's DSP firmware issue (reboots/freezes) in most MJPEG models produced 2012+.  Foscam doesn't seem to actually fix the problem, but Amazon will be more than happy to keep shipping you cameras that have the same manufacturing defect.

Reviews.Title: Nice set of features for the price... but you get what you pay for
Reviews.Author: Bam Bam
Reviews.Content: Edit: Another of the issues I started experiencing- the foscams will occasionally reboot and revert to 320x240 resolution. This will often freak out surveillance programs like BlueIris or Zoneminder.  There is a workaround for zoneminder (specify the resolution in the camera URL), but at this point I am a little tired of doing half a dozen "tricks" just to keep the camera running. Do yourself a favor and save up the extra $ to buy a better camera. One reliable camera is worth more than 2-3 cheap, unreliable cameras.Original review:While I am pleased with the features that come with the camera for the price(wireless, IR with automatic lens filter, etc), I am experiencing several of the issues that others around the internet have encountered regarding quality control.I have the camera connected wirelessly to a new router (latest Actiontec router from Verizon). I use Zoneminder to capture the camera footage and manage motion capture. The camera itself just acts as a "dumb" network camera over wireless.For the first few days, I didn't seem to have any issues- until I looked at my zoneminder logs and saw that the camera was dropping out of contact for long periods of time. Sometimes the camera simply stops displaying video, and must be manually power-cycled to fix. I am going to try connecting the camera to the network using a wired connection, to see if the wireless card is the issue.There are other reports online about how recent batches of foscam cameras were locking up and crashing when exposed to very detailed images, due to using different image processors. See this thread:[...]Long story short, I would be wary about purchasing another one of these for a while due to quality control issues. This is unfortunate, because most of the IP surveillance brands in this price range are actually made by Foscam, and are just re-branded (hint: if a different brand camera looks the same as these preview pics, it is probably a Foscam clone).

Reviews.Title: Hit and miss, mostly miss... (Updated)
Reviews.Author: CodeMonkey
Reviews.Content: I am in IT for a living so the network is solid as a rock and secure, no cheap switches, cables etc.I bought 4 of the FI8904W IP cameras and was pretty happy at 1st.One of them had an led issue, but with sub $100 cameras you should expect a DOA now and then... (Just send it back no fuss)Pros:- All the cameras fired up and worked pretty good. (Nice image quality etc.)- Built much better than the tenvis stuff I have used.- Came with a mount. (Nothing to write home about)- Power supply (although still cheesy) was better than tenvis. (Heavier wire gauge...).Cons:- Wifi Range is short and varied between cameras.  I could not get more than 15ft without signal issues on some of them even though my phone and laptop showed 3 of 4 bars.  But one of them worked fine at ranges ~20ft.2 weeks later the joy has faded...- All but one is flaking out and rebooting it self without warning.  ** It does the same wired or wireless, DHCP(reserved addressing) or Fix IP, inside or outside.  ** it seems like the chipset must get hot and start going crazy.(Disconnect one for 19 min and it will run for a while then go crazy again)- One power supply died. (I swapped in a replacement supply and it came back up...)Summary:So, they are sub $100 hit or miss cameras.I had one work great, and it is still running but all the rest are going back...*************UPDATE:I still don't like these but to be fair:I have figured out the issue I was having:The FOSCams appear to be sensitive to heat...At in the morning as the heat passes ~83F they start rebooting. ;(Then when it drops into the 70's and they pop back online.

Reviews.Title: Not as Good as Indoor FI8910W
Reviews.Author: Kent Borg
Reviews.Content: I would like a better product.  I have two of these and they do work but with two gripes.First, they have needed rebooting. I use this for remote monitoring, and it is not convenient to powercycle the camera, yet once it just went away.  I have taken to doing a remote reboot once a week or so to try to avoid that happening again.Second, though the camera specifications look the same as the indoor pan/tilt FI8910W (640x480, min light 0.5 lux) or better (1/4" sensor instead of 1/5"), the image is much less detailed and the low light sensitivity is much less.  Looking out the window on early morning light the FI8910W shows me a lot at an hour when this product shows near total blackness.  In good light the picture is fuzzier and more mottled.Maybe the lower number in the model suggests an earlier and cruder technology...I am not regretting my purchase, but I would like a better product.Wishlist for all these Foscam cameras: allow the option to see infrared without the LEDs being on.-kb

Reviews.Title: Foscam Outdoor wireless/wired IP camera
Reviews.Author: Mary M.
Reviews.Content: Works great needed a little help from Foscam customer service to get it to load on the computer after talking with them the camera work great.  Now we can see who is ringing our doorbell on the front porch.

Reviews.Title: driveway monitoring
Reviews.Author: Aaron L. Hubbard
Reviews.Content: It set up easily since I did all the hard work with the indoor RPT camera already.  It give a good picture, but wish it had a wider angle lens to see more of the driveway.

Reviews.Title: Image quality is fine but . . .
Reviews.Author: Northridge Uber-Consumer
Reviews.Content: I cannot get it to email me the pics it is supposed to take when motion is detected.  I am not a techno-geek but am proficient enough to have set up the camera and tried all combinations of settings.

Reviews.Title: OK Camera for the Price
Reviews.Author: Yehoshua Ebert "Josh"
Reviews.Content: Camera does function as described. However the biggest issue is that it does not seem to capture any clear images of people. You can see the person but you cannot get any facial recognition. Pictures appear fuzzy and grainy, at least at night. The motion detection picture taking works, and you get the photos sent to your email. This needs to be set up however, and you will likely need their tech support.

Reviews.Title: Average Camera
Reviews.Author: Alex Buchan
Reviews.Content: Very fragile antenna which fell off during installation. Used a network cable for connectivity so the broken antenna was not a huge problem.Camera gives okay pictures and emails me on motion detection. It has however, dropped the internet connection a few times over the last two weeks which can only be resolved by power reboot. - This however is not ideal considering the camera is used to monitor my vacation home.

Reviews.Title: Not as advertized
Reviews.Author: P. Cobble
Reviews.Content: The picture and quality are not as advertised. The wireless antenna was loose and using the hard wire option worked well. The night time IR is not working - outside goes dark at night except for close flying bugs.I had first tried to purchase this model camera that was a cheaper price but suddenly after trying to buy it - the item was cancelled and the cheapest after that was $30 more... This appears to becoming a trend on buying from Amazon... not the first, second or third time this has happened to me on different items.

Reviews.Title: least favorite of my cams
Reviews.Author: Herman Munster
Reviews.Content: Hard to set up....won't connect or frequently disconnects from router even though it has line of sight from 20 ft away....often goes into a weird only purple and green color mode...have to unplug to reboot......emails way too many false alarms....

Reviews.Title: Customer Service
Reviews.Author: Jean Jacob "kjexcavating@hotmail.com"
Reviews.Content: Could not get the camera to work remotely but within 5 minutes, FOSCAM technical support Harry had it up and running.  Great job!!!  Camera seems easy to install and clear viewing.

Reviews.Title: Another Great Foscam
Reviews.Author: MEDISIN
Reviews.Content: We have really come to appreciate the simplicity and affordability of Foscam IP cameras.  We picked up the FI8904W to watch the driveway to our house.  Good field of view and reliable signal over Wi-Fi.  Only minor complaints are the lack of adjustment options on the mounting bracket and limited reach of IR.  May want to pick up a better bracket for certain angles.  IR is limited by the waterproof lens on the front.  Night vision not as pronounced as the indoor Foscams but certainly not bad given the distance and field of view.

Reviews.Title: foscam support
Reviews.Author: paul reed
Reviews.Content: Sarah from foscam helped set up the camera.  The tech support was fantastic! Great customer support. I would not have been able to set up this without her help.

Reviews.Title: If internet is not perfectly matched the camera won't work
Reviews.Author: norm
Reviews.Content: Purchased the camera ,because my neighbor reccomended it.Spent a great deal of time trying to get the software to connect to my Clearwire signal,plus buying a different router .Asked my neighbor to help,the one who did have success getting his camera to work,The software needs to be updated.I sent the camera back .I will use Amazon again,because of their return policy

Reviews.Title: Good product
Reviews.Author: Roy Brown
Reviews.Content: I have installed several of these cameras, The older ones washed out and anything green show up grey hopefully these new ones have filtering that will last. They look great so far.

Reviews.Title: Easy set-up and looks sturdy
Reviews.Author: KiwiDiwi "Yorkies rule"
Reviews.Content: Foscams is slightly ahead when compared to other mid priced brands. My oldest Foscam still works after almost 2 years of service. I have set-up and used so many different brands of IP cams, some are harder to set-up and a majority of them fails after 1-2 years. I was debating wether to give this a 3 or 4 stars since the camera locking ball mount looks weak and the software could use some improvement (i.e. setting up trigger zones and this model also does not have superimposed date/time as in other brands).

Reviews.Title: The camera is sufficient.
Reviews.Author: Thomas T. Holtz "Tom Terrific"
Reviews.Content: I have 2 other indoor Foscam cameras and wanted the same brand for outside to get the best integrated compatibility control.I wish it had pan and zoom like my indoor cameras but that would have been more costly.The main issue I had was that the WI-FI antenna shipped with the product had a very limited distance range (< 15' from my WI-FI router). I had to order a better antenna (13db) to communicate with the camera at a greater distance.

Reviews.Title: Lemon...
Reviews.Author: P. Thompson
Reviews.Content: When the unit arrived and I checked it out it looked heavy and well built.  I have set up similar cameras before and know enough about it to be confident, however after hours of troubleshooting and not getting any results I knew I needed help.  My help was not available right away but when he did get to it the determination was made that the camera did not work...period.  Anyway, between me being out of town and my help being out of town I was TWO days beyond Amazon's 30 day limit for return.  Getting thru to Foscam for help with the warranty wasn't working.  I called Amazon and they graciously said I could return it, but neglected to tell me I would have a $20.00 'restocking charge'.  I wasn't happy about THAT!  I ordered a replacment camera, but if I had known about the restock charge I would NOT have re-ordered from this company.  BAD product right of the box is BAD!

Reviews.Title: I hate it....
Reviews.Author: James C. Cason "james_cason"
Reviews.Content: This is the second camera i buy and it doesnt work... the camera will not keep its wifi internet connection. I have 2 wifi cameras from 2 vendors. the other camera works perfectly and this camera does not....

Reviews.Title: Sorta OK
Reviews.Author: Craig Gaevert "cgarch"
Reviews.Content: Seems like an acceptable camera for reasonable resolution. Works reasonably well in IR mode and the alert mode generates more than enough images. Issue I've had to date: for some reason toggling the camera in and out of alert mode causes the camera to disrupt my wireless network. I've had to reboot the Airport Extreme (latest flavor) on several occasions after turning the alert mode back on. Occasionally images are not available over a web browser requiring a full camera power cycle. I have better resolution cameras on order and will move this camera to a location where it can just monitor a low priority area.

Reviews.Title: customer service
Reviews.Author: al
Reviews.Content: tech was very helpful and patient in restoring our system and very successful in dealing with us as customer. This has been a repeat problem and handled very professionaly

Reviews.Title: My first IP camera
Reviews.Author: val brown
Reviews.Content: I have limited networking experience so it was a challenge to get the camera completely set up.  The videos on the Foscam web site were very helpful...The DVD video that came with the camera,  not so much.  I  was able to get it working wirelessly.  However I hit a wall with getting it to email photos when the motion alarm tripped.  I called Foscam and spoke with Ron Jacob.  I don't believe that Ron is located in this country.  However Ron knows his job well and had the problem solved in short order.The Camera appears to be well made and does all that it is designed to do.

Reviews.Title: FI8904W
Reviews.Author: David
Reviews.Content: These cameras are great! they are easy to set up and are very dependable.  Support has been very helpful and with a easy access.

Reviews.Title: great support
Reviews.Author: Terri
Reviews.Content: Great help.  Stayed with it until all my questions was answered.  Got 2 camera's and would buy them again with all the support and help I got

Reviews.Title: Overheats, Sends Garbled Images, Drops Out of Wireless AND Wired Networks
Reviews.Author: Mitchell Underwood
Reviews.Content: Well, I'm not sure how there are so many good reviews about this product, but my experience with it has been terrible. I ordered two of these, and ended up returning both because they simply don't work outside when the outdoor temp is >70 degrees F. Both cameras started sending garbled images (portions of the image out of place or scrambled), corrupted images (images that can't be opened at all), and psychedelic green/purple images when the temperature outside warms up. These garbled/psychedelic images appeared both in the camera's built-in viewing website and in email/FTP motion detection alerts. Eventually the cameras would simply drop off the network until the outdoor temperature cooled down at night.I had these cameras connected using a Cat 6 Ethernet cable - not wifi. I tried connecting to two different routers, tried different Ethernet cables, and different electrical outlets. I tested the electricity from my outdoor outlet and from the power brick that came with the camera - they were all fine. I tried storing the power brick and other connections in a water-resistant container with a desiccant pack to buffer against humidity fluctuations and prevent condensation. Nothing made any difference. The cameras worked fine when left inside, but as soon as they were mounted outside, they would drop out mid-day when the temperature increased above 70F. These cameras were NOT mounted in direct sunlight. Maybe I just got two lemons, but at this point I think I'm done trying. I guess I'll just save up for a more expensive/more reputable brand of camera.

Reviews.Title: Great picture
Reviews.Author: Paul Ivey
Reviews.Content: The picture is great, but it's not as wide as I thought it would be. Ryan at costumer service was awesome and made the set up easy as I was unable to do it myself. I just can't record right now because they have'nt hooked it up for a Mac, only works with ie.

Reviews.Title: Too dark night time
Reviews.Author: jopet
Reviews.Content: I purchase this camera since they were saying that the IR works very well but it was a mistake. I am planning to return it since it went down from 5 pm till 7 pm today and I have to reset it several times before it started working. I am thinking to buy the extended antenna because maybe it was the problem and I hate to crawl again in my ceiling to take out the power cord. Another thing if you want it to work with your iPad and smartphone you have to purchase the application.

Reviews.Title: What a disappointment
Reviews.Author: michael steven
Reviews.Content: I have multiple Foscam models.  I would never recommend this to anyone.  The wireless range is absolutely sad.  This camera cannot connect beyond about 20'.I can take any other model out beyond 90'.Consider all of your options before buying this one.,

Reviews.Title: Great camera....Great support!!
Reviews.Author: Jeff
Reviews.Content: Have always received great support for any questions or issues I have had with my cameras from initial set-up to ongoing support. Calvin in technical support was very knowledgable and patient with me when providing technical support for my issues and questions!!

Reviews.Title: Ok but don't buy refurbished
Reviews.Author: Robert Makela
Reviews.Content: I received one with writing on it in black marker which was odd & Amazon hadn't even reset it so it still had the other dudes information it.  I then received one where the night vision stopped working after 4 days.  I then received one where the picture turned yellow-ish after a few days.  My other ones are great.  I think it's just the refurbished ones that are bad lol.  I guess that's why they refurbished!

Reviews.Title: works as advertised, WiFi range is a bit limited
Reviews.Author: Jay
Reviews.Content: An excellent wireless IP cam for the price, with lots of features, including motion detection, night vision and so on. However, I  feel that the WiFi range is a bit limited; as it often drops to lower speeds and sometimes drops off the wireless completely. I'm considering getting an extended antenna to fix this issue.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera and Tech Service
Reviews.Author: Kevin Curtis
Reviews.Content: Very high quality image and tech service for set up. I recommend this camera from Foscam. Great value and product

Reviews.Title: What a nightmare !
Reviews.Author: Amador producer
Reviews.Content: The night vision even at 10 yards isn't very good.  The daytime picture is ok, however this really messed up my wifi set up and the time I spent with "international tech support"  sucked so much  time and energy from me , that I will be returning the unit.  It is very touchy and unreliable.

Reviews.Title: TECH SUPPORT
Reviews.Author: Ogdred Weary "AliX"
Reviews.Content: This camera seems very decent.  I had to call tech support for assistance in setting up the wireless and they were extremely helpful. I spoke to Christina, she was very helpful.  Thanks!  SO far it's working very well and a good price.

Reviews.Title: Larger than I thought
Reviews.Author: Belyndae Johanningsmeier "Online Marvel"
Reviews.Content: The outfit is larger than I thought in the picture, but the technology for the night vision, audio, components are well worth the investment. It is easy to mount or to set down on a shelf as we do for monitoring my mother who has Alzheimer's

Reviews.Title: Better than I expected but not anymore once in use
Reviews.Author: Tim  Isenhour "Timbo"
Reviews.Content: ********************************************Update number two. My rating just dropped to one star!  yes, these cameras hoovers in a major way! One has totally stopped working and the other one keeps loosing it's network connection and I am talking wired via a cat 6 Ethernet cable. And when it does work, the video changes to something one would expect if on drugs!  It's like a polarized negative of the image! I'm fixing to call Foscam and ask for a total refund.****************************************************************************************Update: My Wi-Fi/Ethernet problems seem to be not from the cam but from my choice of location in mounting the camera.  Yes, while it was the same distance as my other camera from the router, there was a little product that I didn't think mattered. The Power supply and meter to my home. Obviously, they have a HUGE affect on not only wireless but also wired connections! I was about ready to call Amazon and ask for a refund when I decided to move it away from the meter. Low and behold, the connection returned.  I suspect that if I had a shielded Ethernet cable this would probably not be an issue, but needless to say, it was my power connection/meter causing my connection problems. I only write this as I hope it will help solve other's problems with an outside camera. Don't do as I did and automatically blame the product.  But, the Wi-Fi antenna is a piece of crap! I broke one off just trying to attach it to the cam. Also, the mounting hardware is a piece of junk. Foscam, cut the price of the cam by eliminating both and allow us to purchase them separately, as we will have to do anyway.********************************************I ordered two, so this review is for both.First, the cameras seem to be of a sturdy construction.  while setting them up, I compared them to my other Foscams.  I have two other models (918 and 910), so I knew what to expect from this manufacturer. Both inside and outside, this camera seems to have a much better picture than the indoor models.  Setup was the same, although one of them wanted to be a female dog and not accept my changes (static IP), but it finally took them.The IR is less than the indoor models though.  This puzzles me as one would think that an outdoor camera would need more, but I'm not an engineer.The Wi-Fi also hoovers majorly with this model. I placed one beside of my 910 model camera and it failed terrible at sending a signal. The 910 trumped with flying colors.With all this said, this is still a good camera for the price. The daylight picture makes the other short comings seem minute.Two faults that I see almost cost this rating a star but I decided against it. Fault one is the assuming that the camera will be mounted with the base down. Second, is the quality of the mounting hardware.  It's plastic! Also, hard to adjust as it's cheap quality makes it almost impossible to aim it "precisely". You aim the cam, tighten the fastener, and then it slips/moves!

Reviews.Title: Antenae not large enough
Reviews.Author: unk mo "Unk"
Reviews.Content: The antenae size was not sufficient for my wi-fi to connect from the from the back of the house to the front.  Having to order a booster.  Perhaps a larger antenae would work and should be included as a purchase option.

Reviews.Title: After RMA its a decent cam, horrible outsourced support
Reviews.Author: Dez16
Reviews.Content: I would have given 4 stars if i hadn't had to deal with the support nightmare(see rant below). I did a lot of research before purchasing my first outdoor camera. Foscam had a lot of bad feedback from the pro's but figured i'm not looking for high end security just something to monitor the pets in the back yard while at work. New camera is working well so far. Picture wont win awards but lets me know whats going on. The interface is bad/hideous but gets the job done. I have learned my lesson with contacting support, call them but still not great.<Rant>I bought 1 camera to test out before i bought a couple more. The first camera i bought was a nightmare! Constant connectivity loss, wired and wireless, camera would just lock up and loose picture for hours or days until i rebooted or hard reset(button on device). The colors would also invert to all greens/purples. After a week of testing/resetting i tried emailing tech support, WASTE OF TIME. They dont log tickets so you send your initial email and someone responds within 24 hours, not a problem. Then you reply to their email and someone else may or may not know what the issue is and just loop all the way back to "please try to reset the devise with the button". I already stated in 2 previous emails that I had reset 2 or 3 times in a week. I got sick of it after the second personal wanted to back to step 1 so i called support. Support is offshore(india) so i was not able to understand most of what the tech was saying. In the end he told me that i needed a new camera but I needed to email replacement@foscam.us, he could not fulfill the RMA request for me I had to email them myself. I did that and finally got my RMA request in with "Cross shipping" so i didnt have 2+ weeks without a camera. Waiting for my refund but camera is still in transit to RMA center.</Rant>

Reviews.Title: Defects Galore
Reviews.Author: Sergio P. "Sergio"
Reviews.Content: I'm the owner of 5 FOSCAM cameras for use both indoor and outdoor.  I must say that the indoor FOSCAM cameras have worked great and have no problems with.  The outdoor cameras such as the Foscam FI8904W have been less than acceptable.  I purchased one about two years ago and it only lasted a year before it burned out and died.  At the time I thought maybe it was just a fluke and I'd just replace it with a new one.  Well, I just received this one a couple of months ago and it's already giving me problems.  Apparently this one that I just got won't work unless it's sitting on its side!  If I try to stand it up, the signal is lost.  I tried many different positions and locations until I figured this out.  It's still usable, but I just can't believe a camera would come with such a ridiculous defect.I've given up on these outside type cameras.  The quality is just not there.  Maybe FOSCAM should apply the same quality standards to their outdoor cameras as they do to their inside models.  But I wouldn't take another chance on this.

Reviews.Author: Michigan Guy "Tom"
Reviews.Content: I have a bunch of Foscam security cams and they are ok for the money in my opinion..  I am rating this based on the false claim of 67 Degree viewing angle..  This is just simply wrong..  Check the Foscam website and you will see that a 6mm lens gets you a 30 degree view and the widest view outdoor cam they have is with a 4mm gets you 54 degrees.  I don't know what this cam really is but I wouldn't buy it from someone that can't get the listing accurate.

Reviews.Title: VERY pleased with image quality AND reliablity
Reviews.Author: Stephen G.
Reviews.Content: I use SKJM's iCam software on my iPhone and their iCamsource software on my Mac desktop. I had a few inside cameras, but had never done an outdoor install.After a car was vandalized, I wanted a camera over the driveway. For some reason, users on the SKJM forum gave this camera mixed reviews so I was nervous to try it. However, I have been completely happy with it. It has better color quality and sharpness than my older Airlink AICN500W cameras and is just as reliable.This item is under the eave of our high roof. We drilled a hole through the outer paneling of the house so the cable could go into the attic. NOTE: The cable that comes out of this camera is power, ethernet, and reset cable all in ONE. I think this is for weatherproofing purposes. This is important because when you drill a hole to put this cable into your house, you'll need to drill a pretty large hole -- like a 1" opening or so. You can't just cut this cable and splice it inside OR take it off the camera easily. This wasn't a problem for us. We just ran the cable into the attic and then filled the rest of the hole around the cable with clear silicon.The camera plugs into a regular indoor outlet. We ran a new outlet in the garage. I see you can also buy power adapter extension cable directly from the company. See what you're more comfortable with doing.We use ours wirelessly, and it has been flawless. Image quality is good and the wireless connection has remained strong.SETUP is a bit of a pain. Not in the sense that something went wrong and I had to spend hours trying to figure something out, but more in the sense that the interface is pretty basic. If you have trouble setting an IP address, installing software that needs special configuration, or setting up port forwarding on your router, this camera will make you crazy. However, if these are do-able in your book, you'll be all set. The website for setting up wireless connection on the camera was very basic. You needed to wire directly into the camera first to set it up for wired access. Perhaps there is a utility on the CD included to do all this, but I prefer to stay away from automated setup wizards.I did all of this on my 10.8 Mac using Safari.We have had some rain and the item has continued to work just fine. It is somewhat protected by the eve of the house, but it seemed well built to deal with the elements.The body is all metal. The view angle is smaller than I expected, but I don't do a lot of work with cameras so I didn't have a good visualization of how it would work. The item is about 16" in the air and only shows our two-car-width driveway and about 3' on either side.I tested the night vision capabilities while the item was indoors. It worked really well. Not sure how well it works outdoors, because we installed a security light right by the camera. The night vision is completely automatic -- it turns on and off on its own. Unlike some other cameras, there is not a setting to disable the night vision IR illumination.

Reviews.Title: Sturdy Product and Great technical Support
Reviews.Author: Tung-lung Lin
Reviews.Content: I got this camera and was very excited about it.  The camera is heavy and sturdy.  I followed the steps of the video tutorials about how to install the camera. [...] It has very well clear step by step instruction.  I successfully did the basic setting and wireless setup, but not so lucky on the third step (port forwarding for remote monitor) because my internet provider has a custom-made router.  I read the written document on the Foscam support web-site.  It is very well documented according to type of routers you are using on the market.  However, I got the idea but could not sort through the puzzles and I called the technical support.  The technician setup the port forwarding and e-mail alert for me.  She was friendly and fast to solve the problem.  It is normal to be complicated to setup the IP and Port for people don't know the technology.  However, the instruction is clear.  If there is any problem that one could not solve for installation,  the answer is just a phone call away.

Reviews.Author: David Huchital
Reviews.Content: So far I've tried to install four of these and have gone two-for-four. Two are working very satisfactorily. Both are connected wirelessly and the quality of the imagery is fine. Even the IR images are pretty good. The other two were both partially DOA. One would not scan for wireless networks, the other would not form a reliable connection although the camera was well within range.Contrary to what others have said, I have found tech support to be reasonable. They were able to run my computer remotely and suggested the return of the two faulty units.I've ordered replacements (Amazon makes it very easy to return stuff) and am hoping for better luck.

The good news is that my camera is working great and I even have it streaming wirelessly to my iPad.Many thanks for that guys.The down side is that the calls are to a call center in India and you will have to be prepared for a long call. The guys who I spoke to were very helpfull but their English was a little difficult to ubderstand. (much better than my Indian though)If you are prepared to put up with the inconvenience of this (because you will never be able to work it out by yourself) then the Foscam is a neat piece of kit

Reviews.Title: great foscam camera

Reviews.Title: Foscam camera FI8910W
Reviews.Author: H. Aiken "Beachanytime"
Reviews.Content: The camera works great. Originally the package I received had broken CDs in it (for 2 cameras) but I was able to get  instructions online. Moved to a new home, had issues with setting up the camera, called Tech support and got very satisfactory support. Great experience!

It was a great experience and i would definitely recommend them to anyone. she was very sweet and patient .The cameras are such a great quality for the price and i am very pleased. . Reviews.Title: foscam camera

Reviews.Title: Great service

Reviews.Content: The cameras are great this way we feel more safe when we are not at home cause we can view from our android phone.  The Tech support was great and very helpful when we had trouble getting them connected to our phones.

Reviews.Title: Tech Support
Reviews.Author: Nik Mead
Reviews.Content: Quick service response, very knowledgable service tech. Cameria works well in day and night vision. Love the unit very much. I would reccomedn this unit for other also.Nik

Reviews.Title: Foscam review
Reviews.Author: sheila
Reviews.Content: Calvin Harris was my technician, and was able to provide me with an excellent customer service. I got my cameras set up pretty quickly with his support over the phone.The FOSCAM cameras have turned out to be a great investment

Reviews.Title: Great camera and support

Reviews.Title: service
Reviews.Author: James R McLain
Reviews.Content: great service, solved my problem quickly. camera works great during initial setup, will purchase more soon. price was very reasonable

Reviews.Title: technical support
Reviews.Author: partangel "Jaime"
Reviews.Content: Very satisfied with the help I received when setting up my cameras with our new router. Also the communication from Foscam has been wonderful! Love the cameras and the customer service! Thank you

Reviews.Title: Great product, wish cable was able to be disconnected from back of camera.
Reviews.Author: Roy
Reviews.Content: Installed this on my front porch, product works excellent, just as good as my other foscam cameras.The one thing i would change is the ethernet/power cable on the back of the camera cannot be disconnected, this means you have to drill a much larger hole to fit the cable through since the ethernet part is so large. Otherwise it works excellent. I have my synology DS413j monitoring and recording it.

Reviews.Title: Foscam Camera
Reviews.Author: Rhonda Sitterly
Reviews.Content: Camera was a little difficult to set up so I called Foscam technical support.  I was helped by Sandra who logged into my computer to make all the necessary settings and talked me through the complete setup and even how to set up on other devices.  She was extremely helpful.  The camera seems like it will be a cool way to keep an eye on my three dogs during the day.

Reviews.Title: Great technical support!!
Reviews.Author: Frank
Reviews.Content: I called for technical support and got right through. The tech remotely installed my camera and they work great. I would highly recommend this product and service to anyone. I like the remote access through the internet. Very easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Foscam Camera Well Supported
Reviews.Author: AJ
Reviews.Content: Hi!Wanted to say that we purchased 4 Foscams to use around the house and initially I was a bit frustrated with the set up on my own (Mac and Time Capsule) but when I got on with their customer service, it was a breeze.  Not only did we get everything working, but they actually took the time to teach me what I would need to know and did not rush me through.  They waited for me and answered my questions even once the initial issue was covered.  On top of that, the one time I could not get through on the phone, I sent an e-mail and they actually called me back soon after to make sure that I was being taken care of!  So appreciate great customer service in this day and age!  Highly recommend because you'll get personal help along  way!  If you have any frustrations on your own, just contact them and you'll be back in business!  (Chat was my favorite method of support.)

Reviews.Title: Foscam Camera very good
Reviews.Author: William
Reviews.Content: Bought this camera recently, it wortks very well, and the support from Calvin in Foscam Uk was very good. The camera works very well wirelessly, I use it to monitor my Restaurant, I will no doubt be buying a second shortly.

Reviews.Title: product review
Reviews.Author: winston
Reviews.Content: cameras look very good, picture from camera excellent. set up terrible. support by judy very good except language difference. south mississippi vs indiaoverall very good and a lot of patience by judy nat tech support.

Reviews.Title: customer support
Reviews.Author: Don
Reviews.Content: Customer support for this product is outstanding.  Sometimes a delay in getting through to speak with a technical support representative but once I did, they were knowledgeable, patient and took care of anything I needed while on the phone.

Reviews.Title: Good for the Price
Reviews.Author: Carey Portnoy
Reviews.Content: Note: the following review was meant for the FI8910W but I was given the wrong link and now I cant move it.  However, some of this should still be relevant.Nice camera once you figure out the setup. The thing to remember when you're verifying camera access from a browser or app is that you cannot do this while using your own LAN even if using a cell phone (if set to use WiFi).  Do this with your cell phone connected to 3G/4G.  Otherwise, use the local Static IP you set for the camera - exa: if your router base address is 10.0.0.1 and you set the camera to a static IP of 10.0.0.252, then entering 10.0.0.252 should bring up the Foscam IP Camera Tool where you can view the camera image.  Using this in an app on your pad or cell while using wireless will also work.When you set up a static IP for the camera, you also set a port like 8090, which you enter in the IP Camera settings and in your Router port forwarding setup. So from outside your local network (when you're away from home) you use the IP address that your Modem currently uses with ":8090" tacked on.  If your IP address changes from time to time, set up the Mail Service Settings to email you so you know when it changes and then modify your app accordingly.  Good luck.BTW, Foscam tech support is very good and can get you running in a matter of minutes, but you need patience to get through to them. They may ask for your number to have a specialist get back to you within an hour (such as Jees).

Reviews.Title: Great camera for the price...
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: This is a good camera for the price.  The setup is fairly straight forward if you follow the setup videos on the foscam.us site.  I had a question concerning the firmware levels and the tech support was very fast.  I liked this camera so much I purchased another three cameras.

Reviews.Title: Excellent purchase
Reviews.Author: Chadd
Reviews.Content: This is a great buy, brush up on networking to be familiar with terminologies,pay attention to the application of the camera to determine wheathershort an wide or narrow and long to determine view range,i did and it works better than expectedyou will be required to create an additional email for smtppurposes.

Reviews.Title: remote installation
Reviews.Content: I upgraded my internet service to a higher speed for streaming HD movies.  This required replacing the modem from timewarner which resulted in disabling WAN internet access for my 4 Foscam FI8918W cameras. Hours on the phone with the cable company, I was advised to replaced my router. New router and network installation later with the same result.  I purchased four new 8910 n cameras along with the remote installation option. I called Foscam.us after receiving the new cameras for assistance in the install. Reading other reviews concerning customer service issues, I was pleased when my call was answered after several rings.  I left my name and call back number and was contacted by a technician within 15 minutes.  All four cameras were quickly setup on my local network. Sarah also updated my issue with the motorola cable modem. Cameras can now be accessed using DDNS or ip address over the internet. I highly recommend Foscam.us and their technicians for installations.

Reviews.Title: technical support
Reviews.Author: luke surface
Reviews.Content: port fowarding for foscam.  Support was excellent provided by Ralph Mendes.  Product is good and would recommend.  Have purchased two sets of cameras to date.

Reviews.Title: Works as hoped
Reviews.Author: Jim
Reviews.Content: This is a second outdoor camera and a better price than another popular model I have.  Looks identical to my other one except the branding and color.  Works fine.  No problems.

Reviews.Title: Technical Support
Reviews.Author: Andrew K. Ledford
Reviews.Content: Contacted technical support for Foscam camera installation setup and operation.  The service was fantastic.  Felix helped me fix two cameras and got them up and running in no time!  I LOVE the cameras.  They work well and are perfect for parents with kids!

Reviews.Title: Foscam Support
Reviews.Author: Ray lecuyer
Reviews.Content: We bought 3 F1890W and 5 F18910W direct for Foscam.  They are wireless and remotely viewable via IP address.  The quality of the cameras and the pictures over the internet are great.  The only thing that outperforms the cameras is the technical support I received setting them up by Anzen  It was obvious that it wasn't the first time that he did this.  He was not only a technical expert on this camera and setting them up.  But was very patient with me throughout the process.  I would recommend Foscam to anybody.  Thanks again for the great support.  Ray

Reviews.Title: Technical Support
Reviews.Author: Joe Collier
Reviews.Content: I have to tell you, I just got off the phone with tech supporter Ralph Mendez, he remotely accessed my pc, walked me through what he was doing,1o minutes later up and running wireless. Great Job!

Reviews.Title: wireless prob
Reviews.Author: Joseph
Reviews.Content: Service was fixed quickly.The man was very nice, and got things working well. I am pleased with the camera and the service.

Reviews.Title: FOSCAM 18910W
Reviews.Author: Marauder
Reviews.Content: I you are not tech savvy about connecting things to the internet and have them work as they should....NO WORRIESThe technical support for the FOSCAMS is PHENOMENAL!!!They configured this model (F18910W) to be motion activated and send pictures to my email address...If this does not work for you...there are other configurations...I am so impressed with the camera and support that I am going to add some external cameras to protect my property...Why not when Foscam support makes it this easy to get connected!

Reviews.Title: technical support
Reviews.Author: luis
Reviews.Content: need technical support with ip camera installation. support was excellent. I like from this camera the high quality of image. I highly recommend this camera to all. An d yes Im planning to get another one.

Reviews.Title: Foscam Technician
Reviews.Author: anh
Reviews.Content: The camera is really good. I liked the camera because you can move the camera around and I can see my house whereever I go. The technician is very good to help when I have issue with camera.

Reviews.Title: Foscam Support
Reviews.Author: Machinematrix
Reviews.Content: Support for Port Forwarding fast and successful with over the internet support. Great night vision and  motion detection capabilities.  nice over all cam  ...

Reviews.Title: Foscam tech support
Reviews.Author: Electric Man "AP"
Reviews.Content: Excellent and FAST service when I needed it!  Great camera with many features.  Would recommend to others and I may buy another one.

Reviews.Title: Solid product, excellent customer service
Reviews.Author: Dustin K.
Reviews.Content: I initially purchased the dropcam based on some positive reviews, but was pretty disappointed with the product and service.  After I couldn't get it to work, a friend recommended buying an IP camera, which honestly I had no idea what it was. This was one of the top rated cameras, so I gave it a try.The initial hookup was fairly basic, but the directions to get remote access are pretty confusing.  If you are not tech savvy, as I am not, I would recommend calling customer service from the get-go.  I called and was told a tech would call me back shortly.  I received a call from Calvin Harrison, who is extremely helpful.  He set everything up for me by remotely accessing my computer and explained how to use the app and wrote down pertinent information for me in a .doc file.I am still testing out the product, but thus far, everything has been working great.  The picture is really clear and the panning options are easy to use.  I am definitely going to recommend this product to other friends to use as a "nanny" cam as well!

Reviews.Title: Technical Support
Reviews.Author: Rockiss Estrada
Reviews.Content: Needed help with setting up cameras remotely. Technical support was excellent and they were able to help me get my cameras going in no time. I am very satisfied with the Foscam cameras and have 2 of them at my 2 residences. I recommend these cameras to all as they are inexpensive, a great product and have wide angles.

Reviews.Title: foscam camera made it work horayI have tried at le
Reviews.Author: Ron Schuette
Reviews.Content: I have tried at least 3 times to get these cameras to work untill now no one was sucessful at last someone was able to make them work I am truly appreciated for his expertese and great attitude thank you very much.

Reviews.Title: Great camera service
Reviews.Author: WS Kalseim
Reviews.Content: This was great service and in a very short time.  Not only did we get the issue resolved I learned in the process.  Thanks!

Reviews.Title: Great camera - and service!

Reviews.Title: Ip Cam Set up
Reviews.Author: Murthy
Reviews.Content: It is good in sense that i am able to see and control the motion.Tech support is awesome and was able to answer each and every question.

Reviews.Title: Foscam Support
Reviews.Author: nikki
Reviews.Content: Issue: Port Forwarding and to set the no-ip.The technician was very knowledgeable and knew exactly what to do and only took a few minutes to get me up and going.  He was patient and explained what he was doing especially since I had multiple routers VOIP and wireless.If this works well I may be purchasing additional equipment.The great thing the call back was fast and FREE.  What great customer service.  I highly recommend this company _FOSCAM is great.  With remote control, great video quality and even sound.Geoff Scherer

Reviews.Title: Customer Support
Reviews.Author: Joel R Klein
Reviews.Content: I had an issue with connecting the camera with remote access.  THere were settings I did not have enough computer knowledge to set up.  Customer Service was excellent and set up the ip addresses remotely.  The product was relatively easy to connect with a wireless access  however you require some computer knowledge to set it up.  THe product appears to work very well.  I may purchase more cameras in the future.

Reviews.Title: Foscam
Reviews.Author: Betty N
Reviews.Content: The Foscam camera is a great product and the service is outstanding onlineI am very satisfied with all of the help and Foscam technical support  was very professional and was able to guide me through what I needed to do.I recommend this product to all who need an ip camera and now I am planning to purchase another camera or two they are so good.

Reviews.Title: Foscam Camera Support
Reviews.Author: Tom Davidson
Reviews.Content: Issue: To set the camera wireless.Service was absolutly wonderful. This is the 3rd camera we purchased and the best ever!Would highly recommend foscam and their service is excellent.

Reviews.Title: Good job with support
Reviews.Author: Clay Master
Reviews.Content: Good support and clear video. Like the remote features.The camera is very cost effective too. I can recommend this camera.

Reviews.Title: Great product, great support

Reviews.Content: Great cameras, motion detectors and email alert.Very satisfied with these cameras.Technical support has been fantastic, helped with my port forwarding today.Highlyrecommend foscam cameras

Reviews.Title: technical support is wonderful!

Reviews.Content: I bought foscam f18910w after review all cameras. And I set up myself in my house follow the instruction but i have some question and called 1-800 number and the techician Mr.Jees came in my laptop computer using teamviewer from India and fixed it very perfectly.So I can see my house all around the world with peace of mind.

Reviews.Title: Foscam cameras
