To get them viewable from the internet I had to call technical support and they took control of my computer and set it all up perfectly.  So far very happy with the cameras and tech support.  I have 6 cameras all working and remotely accesible!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Great Service and support!
Reviews.Author: Leo
Reviews.Content: Mr. Anzen from the Foscam Team was great. He Helped me without and reservation and took his time to explain everything! I greatly appreciate his help. I will definitely buy again.Everything is working without any problems. Great problem and awesome support!

Reviews.Title: excellent support on Fi8904W
Reviews.Author: jonnieg
Reviews.Content: I called regarding an issue with making the camera work wireless..I had very good feedback from foscam. I own 6 foscam and all are operating very good.I recommend all Foscam products.

Reviews.Title: great product and support was 100% satisfactory
Reviews.Author: brian
Reviews.Content: cameras have great picture and  and tech support was most patient and fast working. Cameras work great  100% satisfied.. Plan adding more cameras down the road. highly recommend Foscam

Reviews.Title: Works well but...
Reviews.Author: lahills
Reviews.Content: the installation bracket screws stripped and I had to alter the installation method using the same bracket. I was finally able to get it to stay in a rigid fixed position afterwards. I can't seem to find anything about the lens. I wish it had a fish eye type wide angle adapter. None of the documentation tells me the mm size of the lens. At least with foscam I know what I am getting. Since I have put this is a smaller outdoor enclosure (my deck area off the back door), I needed wider view than the camera is offering. I may replace this to another area and try the foscam in the deck area to see if it makes a difference. the color of the video is really good. The only other thing that was causing me issues was interference. The camera had bad interference. Im not sure if it was because of the other network cameras, but when I removed a nearby network camera from the network, the interference stopped. I would buy this camera again for a larger more open spaced area, but the original foscams went on sale and are actually cheaper than this replica so I am sticking with foscams in the future.

Reviews.Title: The support was excllent
Reviews.Author: Ronald D. Foreman "RonD"
Reviews.Content: The product is outstanding to be able to monitor house while gone over the internet, night view is very good.  I requested support for hooking up to internet and they were very helpfull  I highly recommend this product to all I have three and plan on two more.

Reviews.Title: Camera set up and feed back
Reviews.Author: norman
Reviews.Content: The Foscam offers easy use to observe the surroundings when away, I like the remote control feature to pan right and left and up and down.

Reviews.Title: Foscam Camera
Reviews.Author: pm
Reviews.Content: Have only had this a few days. Tech Support is very good although hold time was long. Calvin Harris helped me set up my iPad and use IE9 to connect. . He was very patient and did not get off the phone until it worked. Camera picture quality is very good. Audio is not so good.

Reviews.Title: very good technical support
Reviews.Author: julio
Reviews.Content: I like the Pan/Tilt and the image is clear. Device is very good in the case of price. Calvin Harris has provided very quick support and he is very knowlegeble . I am highly recommend this camera.

Reviews.Title: Foscam ip camera review
Reviews.Author: Vino B. Kannapiran "Vino"
Reviews.Content: Love the camera. Easy to setup. Excellent quality.Technical support provided by "Calvin Harris" was outstanding. Now I am able to access my camera from anywhere in the world.Thanks Calvin!

Reviews.Title: Foscam customer service
Reviews.Author: Steve
Reviews.Content: Harry Foster was the best in the world at helping me setup my product, I am very satisfied. 5 out of 5 stars on the camera, it is well built very high quality. I would buy this camera or other like it in the future.

Reviews.Title: Works for a while - WI-Fi dies
Reviews.Author: R. Schein
Reviews.Content: I've had several of these and on ALL of them the Wi-Fi dies after months of working fine.  It will continue to work in wired mode but wifi does nothing.  I had another FOSCAM camera do the same thing so it appears to be a FOSCAM problem.  SA is only tech support and they email China.  We've done replacements but the replacements fail as well.  I've decided to stay away from FOSCAM.

Reviews.Title: Ip camera Foscam
Reviews.Author: gwap1
Reviews.Content: Issue: Just setting up the 4 outdoor camera. It is wireless now. The camera is working perfectly.Sandra was great, she really knows her business, I hope if I have to call back I get her again, thanks Sandra!

Reviews.Title: Junk
Reviews.Author: Brian
Reviews.Content: I would give it 0 stars but they won't let me.  Got the camera a few days ago.  upon going to mount it i noticed that the mounting bracket is stripped out.  I found a nut that i could use to make it work.  Tried contacting the manufacturer several days ago and to date no response.  Then I noticed i was getting incessant motion alerts.  When I would check, all it was is the picture going from light to dark over and over again in bright daylight (not facing the sun).  Reached out to Foscam again by email to see if they had any suggestions. Still no response.  I spent too much money on this camera to just have it not work and have no support.  Their website is no help either.  Oh and today before I took it down to return it, the camera has started to randomly power itself off and stop the video feed or responding to any commands on the Web interface.  I will spend my money on a camera that is made a little bit better and with a manufacturer that wants to support its product after the sale.  Thanks for nothing Foscam

Reviews.Title: Works Great
Reviews.Author: Francis J. Miele
Reviews.Content: For the price this camera works very well. Good resolution. WiFi works well. Not very happy with the mounting bracket. It's a little cheesy!

Reviews.Title: No Strain no Pain Installation
Reviews.Author: granny
Reviews.Content: This cam does everything it's advertised to do! Easy installation, esay to use mounting hardware, wireless operation is flawless, good night vision over the advertised range....what's not to like? this is a good bargain

Reviews.Title: bad mounting hardware, good camera
Reviews.Author: JP Clark
Reviews.Content: This is my third Foscam camera.  I have two of the "indoor" models that have pan/tilt controls of the camera.  This one works as expected and works well.  My problem is the mounting hardware that Foscam supplies.  The mounting plate/bracket needs to be longer, and it is not possible to tighten the flexible spots so that the camera will stay still.  I'll have to get it in place and then probably glue the flexible joints so it stays.  :(The camera is great, but why are they so cheap on the mounting hardware?  Maybe this is why they sell extra mounting hardware - to make more money?

Reviews.Title: Foscam FI8904W IP Camera
Reviews.Author: Kenneth J. Mccormick "Webmaster About Facts Net"
Reviews.Content: Nice camera, good price. Since it is an IP camera you have to get the stream from the company's website. It may be possible to change this, but I haven't had a chance to check this too closely yet. The software is annoying in that I couldn't find a way of letting others see the feed without allowing them to be able to change my settings. I don't want to condemn it yet, because it is possible I missed something.KenWebmaster[...]

Reviews.Title: lightweight mounting hardware
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I got this camera for Christmas, and it was easy to install.  My problem is that the mounting hardware for the camera is lightweight tin, and the mounting plate strips out very easily. I have to improvise with heavier materials from the hardware store so that the camera will stay upright. It is too shallow to put a jam nut on the bottom of it to stabilize it.  Otherwise, I like the camera.  I wish the infra-red sensor was stronger, but it works very well up close or in the daytime.

Reviews.Title: Don't have auto iris
Reviews.Author: JOSE CHACON
Reviews.Content: The IR works fine, but when sun shine.....the image is terrible (white screen). I download the update firmware.... didn't work. I had put "sunglasses" to the camera for see something at daylight.

Reviews.Title: Great for the price, but some improvements are in order
Reviews.Author: JS
Reviews.Content: For the most part, the camera works pretty well.Likes:1) The night vision is pretty good.2) Wireless functionality works well.3) Price is great for what you get.Dislikes:1) The color image is barely color.  It looks as if the color intensity is turned way down and/or washed out.2) The motion detection seems to false alarm a lot.  Perhaps the sensitivity needs better calibration.3) There doesn't seem to be a way to record video.4) Not sure how weather resistant the dangling ethernet and power ports are.  I'd recommend coming up with a way to enclose them in something when used outdoors.5) Not having all the "control panel" options for the 'visitor' user would be nice.  No need to confuse people with a bunch of buttons/menus which don't work.  I was hoping there would be a way to simply show the video, with no menus/options, but this doesn't appear to exist.

Reviews.Title: Good Camera, not for area viewing
Reviews.Author: RS Service Co
Reviews.Content: I have had 6 of these cameras since December 2010 and have just ordered 2 more today.  I use them to view areas around my home, shop and orchards.  I would have given them 5 stars except for these following issues which were not too important to my use:  They give a very clear picture both day and night but at night you have to switch from the outdoor setting to 60HZ to get a picture with the area very well lit.  The IR is OK indoors but it is useless outdoors for open area viewing, I guess because there is nothing there to reflect the IR.  The color is not as good as it should be days and bad at night, but again, the picture is very clear and the field of view is great...both matters of importance to my usage.I also have 2 of the P&T; cameras used inside my shop and pool area of the house.  The field of view is only OK with them but very clear.  I give them a 4 star also but I have had to get them replaced several times because they simply quit functioning completely.  I was not very pleased in the return/replacement ordeal via AMAZON but I did manage to accomplish it...and it did cost me the shipping in both directions.

Reviews.Title: Great for the money.
Reviews.Author: Max B. Turner "skyyabsolute"
Reviews.Content: Foscam service is the best. I had a fellow named Calvin who made sure all five of my cameras were up and running and accessible through the internet for remote viewing. Got to say both the product and the service could not be better.

Reviews.Title: Not for landscapes
Reviews.Author: Love my Views
Reviews.Content: I installed this at the beach house, specifically to see sunsets from our sky-deck.  Suffice to say, you get what you pay for.  The resolution on this camera is pretty bad.. fuzzy images / poor contrast.  Probably ok as a simple monitoring device but not for enjoying a remote view.

Reviews.Title: Not Too bad but problems exist!
Reviews.Author: pango adiuvo
Reviews.Content: Well the network setup is very easy. I did it all in Ubuntu Linux. I have it sending images to my FTP server just fine. I must admit I have NOT used their software. It may take care of the problems I have with the camera. The problems I found: The network SSID or passwords CAN NOT use the "+" plus sign. It turns them into a " " (space). This caused me some problems, but do-able. The camera is setup for night vision. This means that during the day the colors don't look good. Green leaves and grass are closer to purple. The night image cam be nice and bright. Here in lies the problem. I am having trouble getting the brightness and contrast set to a good all round "looks OK" setting. The automatic brightness doesn't seam to adjust very well. Some times it is too bright or too dark. As clouds pass this causes problems. Next the Alarm sensitivity is very poor. With it set to 10, least sensitivity setting, it triggers on tree leaves moving. You don't have any zones to set. On lower settings it just triggers all the time.  A 67 degree field of view isn't bad. I will need 2 cameras to cover my front yard, it isn't big either.  Bottom line for the price it isn't too bad. I am going to keep looking for a better camera myself.

Reviews.Title: great little cam for the price
Reviews.Author: David
Reviews.Content: works just fine. and yes, it is a 3.6mm lens and it is 67degree viewing angle. for this price you cant beat it.

Reviews.Title: Good little camera
Reviews.Author: Jeff McClain
Reviews.Content: Pros:Good picture, lots of options on settings and pretty easy to setup (has web based ability to tie in up to 9 pictures through one IP).Cons:Loses connection sometimes if you swamp out the speed (that may be my network, not the camera?)  I wish they were MPG4.I like this 67' View angle one better than the 22' narrow angle camera.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera for the Price.... but Wrong Lens!!!
Reviews.Author: Brian
Reviews.Content: First off, this is a great camera of the money.  I have had it running wirelessly for a couple weeks now and I have always been able to access it both locally and over the internet (via my iPhone).  There are some issues during the day with some slightly washed out areas on the sides, but we're talking about a $100 camera here, so it's certainly not going to be anywhere near perfect.  It does what we need it for (viewing the main entry door to our house) and does it well.The reason I gave it only four stars is that, even though it's advertised as coming the 3.6mm lens, I actually received the 6mm version.  This is not a huge deal for me as I am pretty handy with electronics, but it very well mat be a deal-breaker for someone less electrically inclined.  My solution was to just buy a replacement lens - I found a genuine Foscam 3.6mm lens for less than $10 shipped on eBay.  I'm not sure how far I would've gotten in trying to return the camera and getting the correct one, but to me, the $10 was worth not having to deal with that hassle.  Besides, I now have a spare 6mm lens in case I ever want to use the camera in a place that a narrow lens is more suited.

Reviews.Title: Works but not very good focus
Reviews.Author: John Kelley
Reviews.Content: I bought this because I needed one for outside. Camera was easy to setup on my wireless network. Color is only fair. Focus leaves a lot to be desired. It will do the job for me but the image quality is not even close to their FI8918. They need to provide a way to focus the unit. Night vision would be better if I could focus the unit.

Reviews.Title: Pretty good
Reviews.Author: Lacey
Reviews.Content: I ultimately am happy with this camera.  I would like the color to be a little better but I got what I paid for, so I really can't complain too much.  I purchased this because I was tired of our vehicles being broken into, so the motion detection was a must for me.  For right now the thing goes off for almost every car that drives by but not really for people walking, even in my driveway.  I need to change where it is mounted and see if that helps, I think the main focal point of the camera needs to be centered better on my property.The biggest issue I have had with this whole thing is the lack of options for the email accounts you can use to go with the motion detection alerts.  I use gmail and that is not supported by Foscam's firmware.  The only free accounts they recognize are gmx or yahoo (based on my lengthy research and use of the Foscam forum) and gmx is a HUGE pain!!  This isn't all that bad, just annoying really.  This and the motion detection business are the reason for the 4 stars.  If these things were better I wouldn't hesitate to give it 5 stars!All in all I am happy with the camera.  I know I could have found one that is a much higher quality but its just fine and the price is really fair.

Reviews.Title: All your base are belong to us
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I was able to get this set up and displaying a picture on the computer. The instructions are extremely poorly translated English and really of no use in setting up the device. Once I had it showing a picture I noticed that it was not able to pick up the color red or black accurately. I did some reading and found this was a by-product/issue with the night vision system. I never got to testing the night vision. I just boxed it up and sent it back to Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Not for the novice
Reviews.Author: Ivar
Reviews.Content: The camera model is IPCAM01.  The manufacturer was not identified anywhere. The packing slip shows it was shipped from 'Electree', in Shenzhen China.The camera itself looks cool. The mounting harware is very flimsy.The camera comes with a mini cd presumably containing the software. The small manual suggests to 'double click IPCamSetup.exe'. There is no such file visible on the cd However there is a folder called "IP cam tools - XP OS" clicking on this folder reveals a computer symbol with the words "IPCamSetup" Double clicking this starts a typical installation process. At the end of the installation you are supposed to reboot. After rebooting a thumbnail image of 'IP Camera Tool' appears on your screen. Double clicking this creates an empty rectangular screen supposed to be the dialog box. Unfortunately as mentioned earlier the field is empty and I was/am at a loss on how to proceed other than trying to return the item.

Reviews.Title: Stopped working
Reviews.Author: John
Reviews.Content: I have had it for a month, now wireless don't work and video don't work.  Not to impressed with Foscam, I also have an indoor pan tilt.  I have to reboot that thing constantly.

Reviews.Title: FOSCAM FI8904W Camera review
Reviews.Author: Ruben Sotelo
Reviews.Content: I ordered 3 Foscam FI8904W Outdoor Wireless/Wired IP Camera and all seem to be working fine except one camera.To ensure connection issues are eliminated with a wireless connection, I are hard-wired the camera directly to my network with Cat6 cables. Two of the camera function fine without any problems or losing the connection, however the third camera loses it's connection at least once every hour. It only takes about 30 seconds to reestablish the connection, however this is not happening with the other cameras. I switched the cables around, switched the IP on the cameras but this one camera seems to be defective.I will be contact FOSCAM to see if i can get a replacement camera.

Reviews.Title: Nice toy that worked part of the time
Reviews.Author: art
Reviews.Content: Does not work all the time can sometimes talk to it other times I can talk to it but no video.

Reviews.Title: Piece of Junk
Reviews.Author: NetBuyer
Reviews.Content: Lasted two years. In between I spent hours of troubleshooting, from having to dismount it from location because it lost the wifi ip address, to troubleshooting night vision. Night vision worked indoor for few months. Motion detection did not work at night ever.Today the video failed completely and it's a toss. Th ipcamera tool software did not detect it so in order to do a custom config it has to be connected via cable. Pain in the neck if the camera is mounted in a remote area.Look elsewhere...

Reviews.Title: The web interface crashes, don't do firmware updates or you might brick it.
Reviews.Author: summerholiday2
Reviews.Content: Not a good picture, not a good interface and not good at streaming a signal.  Only use this if you are live-monitoring your cameras or have a dedicate machine constantly recording.  The firmware is junk.Wireless works only intermittently.

Reviews.Title: Amazing Customer Service!
Reviews.Author: gwap1
Reviews.Content: Sarah was amazing, she needs to made it look more difficult, she fix my problem in less the 30 seconds, really made my feel dumb! These cameras are really worth the price, I have had cameras costing much more that were no where as good, very good value. The best feature is the picture, very clear, even at night, amazing. I can honestly say I cannot find any negatives on this model camera, F18904W and a great camera for the price.

Reviews.Title: Working Camera
Reviews.Author: Matt M.
Reviews.Content: I was very happy with the telephone support provided by Foscam.  Technical support was able to quickly identify my problem and resolve the matter to my satisfaction without taking long at all.  Thank you for your support.  The cameras are very clear and easy to control.  The best part is the accessibility via the web and iphone etc...  Adding additional cameras is not a problem.  Once you get one you will be looking to add another very soon after!

Reviews.Title: Computer Crashes
Reviews.Author: Bo
Reviews.Content: Don't know if it works as advertised.  Software crashed my computer  -  three days to recover computer,  software still not loaded.The stand which comes with the unit doesn't work,  it is a friction device which will not hold the weight of the camera.Sure hope it works if I ever get the bugs out.

Reviews.Title: This is my first and last Foscam, a very poor 5VDC design
Reviews.Author: SH "Steve from the Mountains in NM"
Reviews.Content: This is my first and last Foscam because of the following reasons.  The Good, I have a Synology NAS which will work with the Foscam FI8904W.  I have two Tenvis 602W which are improved clones of the Foscam in some ways and they work with the Synology if I set them as a Foscam. Tenvis uses 12VDC and the wireless signal is much stronger than Foscam. The single plus for this Foscam model is that it has a slightly wider view angle, that's all. The negative is that the technical brain for this product was a very poor designer. Foscam uses a 5VDC power source, that's fine IF the distance from the power adapter to the camera is less than 50ft. I have a 70ft distance, using 16g stranded copper, the voltage drops just enough so that during the day with natural lighting the camera works via CAT5e ok. Because the voltage is so low the wireless range is extremely short < 60', my wireless router is 70' away so I cannot use the wireless feature ether. But at night when the IR LEDs kick on it drops the voltage just low enough so that the camera shuts down, idiot engineer. If I turn on another night light in the area the unit comes back on, when the IR LEDs go off.  I will have to run 12VDC through the wire and then run it through a 5 volt regulator circuit to fix this mess.

Reviews.Title: Very nice camera  for the price.
Reviews.Author: Randy.M
Reviews.Content: I have always said you get what you pay for and you get a good camera from foscam not the greatest but gets the job done, If you want the greatest you with have to pay about $1000.00 per camera. so for $100.00 shipped that not bad at all.I would not listen to all the bad reviews on here 90% of people just like to bash things they don't understand.I will say it does take about an hour to set it up and if you are using a modem/wireless router they don't work you need a separate router,(Linksys has worked fine for me) I don't know what all the fuss is about foscam.us offers tons of support they have a very helpful FAQ and forums section.I hope this helps you in your purchase.I will say if want remote viewing (3g/4g smartphone/ different computers out side of your router) you will need some advanced computer skills. Port forwarding can be tricky.

Reviews.Title: A great IP cam ...but so many bad reviews?
Reviews.Author: Tech Gadget
Reviews.Content: The IPcam worked better than what I expected... armored, weather-proof, easy set up and nice night vision. Our first experiment for the Foscam was an outside petcam setup ...we always wondered what the dog did while we were away. Unfortunately, the cam shared similar "exposure challenges" of any camera... just need to avoid mixed bright and dark contrast levels in the same frame to reduce the "back-light" effect.  The setup was so easy that I didn't even open the manual nor use the install disk... I just followed hints from other reviews. First, plugged the cam into the router and opened the router's DHCP client list to find the cam's IP address. Next, I use the IP address to log onto the cam, configured user accounts, WiFi and LAN settings. Then, I disconnected the lan cable, reset and presto... wireless cam found by the router! Next, I configured remote internet viewing with a free account on "no-ip.com".  You'll need a no-ip.com host account (or any dyndns service) to compensate for the dynamic IP addressing used by most ISP... I have Comcast. After waiting a few minutes for no-ip.com and port-forwarding to propagate, success!  ...we now have remote petcam anywhere... fantastic!  For out-door use; this cam is the best deal I found so far.

Reviews.Title: $100 bucks and two weeks
Reviews.Author: Ellis
Reviews.Content: Would love to say someting nice about this device but hard to find. It does have a nice night recording but during the day the picture is whited out. The  email feature does not work.  The remote viewing does not work. The sensativite even on 1 is too high. The bracket is poorly made. Tech support only can not even help fix it.  OH and it only worked for two weeks.

Reviews.Title: This IP camera is good for monitoring.
Reviews.Content: This IP camera is good for monitoring, for the price you pay. I give it 4 stars for the one reason:1) It has color problems! It don't show right colors on you if you wearing black it shows white etc.This camera not the best but for the price you pay this is good outdoor camera! It's easy to set up all you have to know how to read English. The instruction that comes with camera is too small to read but I did it. You won't know it if its good or bad camera until you try it.P.S Hope you will like it, like I did.

Reviews.Title: Losing Connection
Reviews.Author: YFM "YM"
Reviews.Content: I setup a camera and tested for a week.Every 5 to 8 hours losing connection and can not log into the web admin page again.As many people mentioned on the internet forum, power cycle problem with camera,I suspected.I made contacts with Foscam Ltd. many times, and got fast answers.I tried everything what she wrote, but could not solve the faster connection of router.I made a contact to Lynksys what I am using the router, and I could not get answer.Foscam seemed to be all right with even reviews, but ......I am returning this thing.I purchased from eworld, but my web connection opened this page.It looks like right product ( not fake ).All connection in the web admin page is showing right. but losing connection that is not really helpful. Once I tried X10 camera, it was wireless, and could not operate well from windows XP too,  But I am using Mac with this foscam, and I don't think it is computer problem.

Reviews.Title: Tried it twice, No Cigar
Reviews.Author: CAGE801
Reviews.Content: Have ordered two of these now; the first one was DOA, the second worked for about 20 minutes then died.  Poor quality, I would stay away.

Reviews.Title: Good camera, bad description.
Reviews.Author: Max Dunn
Reviews.Content: Camera is fairly easy to setup and get things going with. I'm a computer technician so I didn't really need to use any of their software. I currently use Blue Iris to monitor, motion detect, and capture video and it all works well. The video quality is 640x480 at around 5fps, a little grainy, but in focus and you can usually make things out with no issue. If you've got a webcam, you've seen this video quality.The camera in good quality, tough (dropped it once onto concrete with no ill effects), takes a nice clear picture, adjusts fairly well to changes in light. The place my camera sits get's heavy sunlight and there's a security light that is within 6" of the camera as well. The camera handles it all. The mounting stand it comes with... not my favorite. Two thumb-screw tightened ball joints and the whole things required lots of plier action to get it how I wanted it.The issue is the night vision. It works, but at a fairly reduced range from the description says "15-20 Meter" and the box says "10 meters". In range of the night vision, things look great. Too bad it's not what is advertised.Summary: A good purchase for low end security or cheap DIY (that's me) but the description isn't accurate.

Reviews.Title: Foscam F18904 Outdoor Camera
Reviews.Author: Daniel S. Jablonoski
Reviews.Content: Price is good for outdoor cam. Setup of the camera is fair but lacks significant tools. Motion detection tool must use full screen detection  rather then single movable point detection. IP function only works for multiple single frame stills recordings. Videos can only be recorded to local hard drives or needs to go though computer to  mapped drives. Can not save videos  directly to NAS drives via IP address through the router (Very important and common feature for wireless security cameras) Pigtail on the back of the camera is awkward to  work with. Camera mount kind of minimum, should have been beefier.  For the price you get what you pay for.

Reviews.Title: IPCam is a solid camera
Reviews.Content: The camera was developed with a solid interface and easy to use and set up, the colors were off with no way to adjust

Reviews.Title: Outside video quality is horrible.
Reviews.Author: Christopher Cordray "RootGeek"
Reviews.Content: I have several Wifi/IP cameras inside both my home and business, and this is by far the lesser of the bunch. Night time video quality is limited to a relatively short distance of only about 20 feet, the mounting stand it comes with is very cheap and required some coordination to assemble and install. The biggest draw back was the overall picture quality. Setting the camera adjustments for a decent daytime picture, makes it almost unusable during dark lighting conditions, and vise versa. One would think that an outdoor camera would adjust it's exposure to meet the needs of changing lighting conditions. All that said, the network setup was easy and the camera does perform under more controllable circumstances. If you're looking for an outdoors camera for security purposes, this one will disappoint!

Reviews.Title: Alarming pretty useless
Reviews.Author: jackoByte
Reviews.Content: Was pretty easy to setup if you have a modicum of network knowledge. FTP saving works but so what?The problem is the on board CPU must be so underpowered. Aside from the lo-res picture the frame rate seems abysmal and the "Alarming" lags a good few seconds so you can't pinpoint an area for coverage. You would have to have someone approach head on from some distance to catch any images. Plus false positives by light changes, I think thats all that the on-board logic does.Also lot of features are only available thru IE, plus various features in the web interface are not present as shown in the manual e.g. beep on "Alarming", also irritatingly going to the web-interface you always have to select the mode of its operation before being able to view the pic.

Reviews.Title: camera
Reviews.Author: barry flaks
Reviews.Content: great camera very helpful service company was great to deal with happy content felice awesome i would hes bu gain

Reviews.Title: great tech support
Reviews.Author: bridport7
Reviews.Content: They really take time and do a fantastic job. I couldn't have done this myself Going to purchase another cam after I get usedto these two!

Reviews.Title: Foscam Operation
Reviews.Author: Jim
Reviews.Content: Fantastic camera!  The setup was a little challenging, but the technical support was very good.  I would recommend this item.

Reviews.Title: Tech Support
Reviews.Author: dja00418
Reviews.Content: Fantasic Service! Very solid support and I found the rep to be quite helpfull and very knowlegable. I would highly reccomend this service to all!!!!

Reviews.Title: technical support
Reviews.Author: kareempain
Reviews.Content: the technical support was very helpful finished everything in under ten minutes helped alot never had any problems will call for help again.

Reviews.Title: Good tech support
Reviews.Author: Ryan Leung
Reviews.Content: It was great support and great product.  The technician was very helpful and guide me through the process from beginning to the end.

Reviews.Title: Foscam camera
Reviews.Author: Guru
Reviews.Content: Foscam camera is an excellent camera for in-home use. The purpose I use it is to monitor remotely.The service provided by Foscam customer service was excellent. It took about 15 mins to set it up to the router and access the camera remotely through a smartphone.

Reviews.Title: cam reset
Reviews.Author: edward
Reviews.Content: had to reset cam settings for email. Had problems wit cameras not sending emails. had to call custmer service to reset. Problem was resolved.

Reviews.Title: foscom support
Reviews.Author: glenn a boesger
Reviews.Content: The support was very good. I arranged for a call back yesterday and the support team called as scheduled...THANKS. This remote view capability is working great.

Reviews.Title: tech support
Reviews.Author: Kenneth
Reviews.Content: Peter was fantastic, his patience and knowledge of camera is excellent.Peter also connect my iphone 5 and works great.Thank you1

Reviews.Title: Tech Support
Reviews.Author: J. Childers "(Proud Parent)"
Reviews.Content: Great service. Resolved the issue remotely within 20 Minutes. Thanks!Should be up and running without any further problemsWill call again with any further issueswait time was my only complaint

Reviews.Title: service
Reviews.Author: amanda
Reviews.Content: Technician was helpful. However, I waited on hold for an hour waiting on someone to answer my call. The set up instructions that came with the product were incomplete.

Reviews.Title: Technical Support
Reviews.Author: Justin
Reviews.Content: VERY HELPFUL.  I needed my cameras set up and viewable on my computer. Then I also needed to be able to view from anywhere on the internet and they successfully helped me and it was quick and easy on my part. Thank you so much.

Reviews.Title: great product!!
Reviews.Author: danny
Reviews.Content: great product which enables you to access your camera through your phone and provides you with awsome security.Camera is easy to insatll. excellent tech support.I would definately recommend this product.....

Reviews.Title: Foscam tech support
Reviews.Author: colin snyder
Reviews.Content: Very quickly resolved issue, great job, camera has a excellent picture and works great,would recommend to others. The support was very good and it is nice to be able to receive such quick instruction

Reviews.Title: Great Support
Reviews.Author: Bull
Reviews.Content: The camera works great! Excellent support team when needed would recommend this product to all and any friends.Will purchase another camera in addition to the one I have. sends an instant email photo to my iPhone ! Great stuff!

Reviews.Title: foscam setup
Reviews.Author: Barry Gardner
Reviews.Content: ask for calvin he is the MAN for all your set up problems he is 100%^the camara is first class picture quality is very good

Reviews.Title: Foscam
Reviews.Author: David
Reviews.Content: Camera great value for money, does everything it says in the specification and does it well; the technical support from Foscam was excellent in helping me set up the Total Control software (patient, prompt, authoritative) for linking the camera to my Blackberry.

Reviews.Title: Foscam Help Center
Reviews.Author: Elizabeth Thompson
Reviews.Content: We needed to set up remote viewing for our Foscam Wireless camera and were hopelessly lost.  We called the help center and they were amazing.  They helped us promptly and professionally.  I highly recommend the camera and service.

Reviews.Title: Technical Support
Reviews.Author: Frederick
Reviews.Content: I received great tech support form Foscam for setting up video and snapshot processing. I am very satisfied with the product and the support. I recommend this camera to anyone!

Reviews.Title: foscam support
Reviews.Author: damaso
Reviews.Content: The camera is great and your tech support is the best. I will keep on looking for to buy more foscam cameras. I can recommend this camera for everybody.

Reviews.Title: Wrong Lens -- Again
Reviews.Author: J. COLTZ
Reviews.Content: I seems from the other review here that you take your chances on receiving the wide angle lens. I ordered the 3.6mm wide angle, and like others, received the 6mm lens instead. I'm returning the camera. How hard can it be, really, to send what was ordered?? Mine came from Firemall LLC.

Reviews.Title: Nice Camera ugly guidelines
Reviews.Author: Paperless Office
Reviews.Content: Good camera, but need you have high skills to activate all functionalities. Connect to my home wireless is so easy but is to hard to connect to internet because the user guide isn't good guide. I can't connect automatic mail function because I don't understand the guidelines. Other function that frustrates me is connection with blackberry. I download many programs but always received the same message "connection canceled"....Finally I always thrust in American Quality Products but now American companies starting to import from China and we lost that security. I encouraged American importers for request chinese factory's that maintain quality standards, clear userguides, support, etc.

Reviews.Title: Nice day time camera, unusable night time camera
Reviews.Author: C. Myers
Reviews.Content: I've been working with these for a while now and I just can't support them.  I've bought and returned 2 and am about to make it three.They are nice outdoor day cameras.They are horrible night vision cameras.Even when plugged in via a wired network, when it shifts to full night vision in low light they drop to 3.8 frames per second.  And each frame is so blurry during any motion it is useless for identification.I was so hoping for it to work and kept trying.  But when I finally got definitive support, Foscam just agreed with me that slow frame rate was all that would work.So, don't buy it for night vision.  But if a day cam is fine. then have at it.

Reviews.Title: Poor design, hard to implement, wifi buggy
Reviews.Author: Alejandro Gidi Chavez "Gadgeteer"
Reviews.Content: We have bought several of this cameras, they are decent quality, but thats about it. Some of them did get humidity inside making the lens fog. We had to open, clean and re seal with extras provided by us.The wifi model is no reliable. They do work fine over ethernet. Do NOT trust the software to properly detect motion and dump images, it will fail on you.This can be used for monitoring but not security.

Reviews.Title: foscam service
Reviews.Author: Rogen
Reviews.Content: Calvin took control of my computer and helped me to configure my i-pad. Exceptional technical response. Thank you.  job well done.Foscam camera F18910, works perfectly on both desktop computer and now i-pad. Will also download camera on new i-phone 5.

Reviews.Title: Foscam great service
Reviews.Author: Rig
Reviews.Content: Very helpful. He has been helping me to view the camera from my computer and my iPad. The camera is great to be able to check on the house when I'm gone.

Reviews.Title: Does not provide advertised features
Reviews.Author: My review
Reviews.Content: Please read:After receiving a brand new camera I upgraded to the latest firmware only to find that 'TLS/STARTTLS' is not support on my camera, even though this is a feature and is described in the instruction manual.  I would not have bought this camera, and I'm going to return it, had I known this.  Furthermore, their site does not include the actual customer testimonials, they are false.  This product doesn't have 4 stars nor the support they offer.  It requires port forwarding (if you're comfortable configuring your router to do this, then you can consider it 'easy' installation), as well as specific routers/access points for compatibility.Their site originally had the camera advertised for $114.95 but I was informed that it was a 'typo' and instead price is really $124.  That should have been my clue, but when the box came and support was spelled 'suport' I know I was in trouble.  Rather than try and impress anyone with my credientals, let's just say that I'm well qualified.  I make mistakes too, which is why I'm writing this.  Hopefully someone will read it and save themselves the migraine and buy a DLink.Sending it back tomorrow and I'm canceling the credit card it was ordered with.

Reviews.Title: Works well either during the day OR at night, but not both!
Reviews.Author: MarkH
Reviews.Content: This is a nice camera, that works fine in full darkness OR full daylight. Unfortunately, it has no auto exposure so it does not work 24/7... you get nice night vision and a white screen during the day, or nice day vision and a black screen at night. Pretty useless for my security application.I contacted Foscam, and they told me to pay $45 for their software that automatically adjusts the exposure so the camera worked 24/7.So, I've just returned it so I can get a camera that works 24/7!

Reviews.Title: Does NOT have a 3.6mm 67° lens, has a 6mm 42° lens
Reviews.Author: RM
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera because the description states that it has a 3.6mm lens with a 67° field of view.  Instead it has a 6mm lens with a 42° field of view.  A check of the FosCam website (foscam.com) confirms that the FI8904W has a 6mm lens.

Reviews.Title: Great Service.. Able to understand them well...
Reviews.Author: Carolyn Seritt
Reviews.Content: My camera was disabled when I had a power failure which reset all my connections... the tech remotely signed in and repaired all the settings I am very pleased.  Thank you so much.

Reviews.Title: incompatible with hughesnet
Reviews.Author: Mike Shealy
Reviews.Content: Did not disclose that you cannot use swann software if you use hughesnet.Customer service tells you to contact linksys rep.linksys tell you to contact hughesnet ,hughesnet tell you to contact swann.Just one big circle.Swann customer service no help..

Reviews.Title: Works great.
Reviews.Author: Larry P
Reviews.Content: Bought this camera to watch my backyard.  Like the wide angle view able to see entire area.  Set up not that difficult foscam website has helpful videos to get you thru.  This is my fourth camera and haven't had any problems with any of them.

Reviews.Title: Outdoor camera...
Reviews.Author: alex trim
Reviews.Content: This is a good outdoor camera> It has got a great picture clarity and it has a good night vision. The wireless reception of the camera is one of the good feature. Tech support from Foscam helped me in setting up this camera and I recommend this. Thank you Irish from Foscam tech support.

Reviews.Title: Technical Support
Reviews.Author: Timothy Bower
Reviews.Content: Very easy to work with, easy instructions, got everything working just the way I need to to continue to operate my business.  Recommended.

Reviews.Title: excellent product
Reviews.Author: vic gilchrist
Reviews.Content: Had great assistaince from Calvin Harris @ Foscam uk in getting my cam set up, great asfter sales service!! Camera is F18905W, very competively prices, ease of use excellent and good instruction with it too, would recommend!!

Reviews.Title: Technical help
Reviews.Author: richard kennerley
Reviews.Content: Called for technical help over the Christmas period. The Foscam representative was very helpful logged onto my PC remotely and resolved the issue. Very good service and happy with the product. calvin Harris was very helpful and had a good knowwledge of the required setting changes.

Reviews.Title: foscam support
Reviews.Author: henry
Reviews.Content: Fantastic technical support, Calvin Harris has performed an excellent job to get my Foscam running again in minutes!  Thabnks a million!Henry

Reviews.Title: Tech support
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I contacted Technical support, a Mr.Peter Watson, and he was very helpful in setting up my 5 ip Cameras so that I can access them via my Cell Phone while away from home.  They work great!

Reviews.Title: Satisfied Customer LO
Reviews.Author: Judi Oshowole
Reviews.Content: Very helpful and patient service by Calvin. The camera is extremely nice with a good picture. Many Thanks. I will definitely do it again.

Reviews.Title: foscam setup
Reviews.Author: cecilia
Reviews.Content: i received very good customer support.  the service was quick and 'painless'.Calvin explained the process while he was going through it.  Very professional and friendly.

Reviews.Title: Technical Support
Reviews.Author: Hector Juan C
Reviews.Content: I contacted Foscam Tech Support to help me set up my IP cams both on my Mac and my Iphone.Sarah was very patient and helpful and managed to set everything right!I hope guys at Foscam develop an Iphone5 App that can work with the newest FI9820W HD cams soon!!!

Reviews.Title: Foscam setup tech support
Reviews.Author: Eugene Tucker
Reviews.Content: The online tech help was very good and worth the money to get it set up easy. Very good service.

Reviews.Title: Foscam Technical Support
Reviews.Author: Dave
Reviews.Content: Technical support was able to resolve problems I was having getting the camera to work via internet.  This included troubleshooting modem/router issues.  It was a relief to get the problem resolved in one phone call, without the runaround you sometimes get (it's not our problem, call xxx).Good service and problem solved.

Reviews.Title: foscam setup and support
Reviews.Author: Patrick Wyatt
Reviews.Content: Kate was extremely helpful in setting up my two camera. She also gave me information on how to use motion detection and access my cameras from remote locations. She was very patient with me because I do not have much technological experience. Overall this was a terrific experience and I know that I am going to enjoy the camera especially once I set up the remote access and the motion activation.

Reviews.Title: Foscam support
Reviews.Author: Tomer Aryev
Reviews.Content: Called in to get some help setting up the camera, support was quick and effective, had the camera configured properly in a matter of minutes. thank you!

Reviews.Title: Great product!
Reviews.Author: Michelle Rochette
Reviews.Content: Camera works excellent and the customer service was very helpful and helped me solve an issue I had. I spoke with Allen Smith who was very knowledgeable and a pleasure to work with. Highly recommend him!!

Reviews.Title: awesome camera and support
Reviews.Author: T. Dunmire
Reviews.Content: very satisfied with camera and received great support after my ISP messed everything up. support@foscam.ussarah Johnson she rocked it and got all my settings back in a matter under 5 mins and explained in detail how to make sure it does not happen again and how to solve if it does happen. I will be buying three more cameras for my network.

Reviews.Title: Piece of junk
Reviews.Author: avalentino
Reviews.Content: This camera has poor documentation and is not easy to install. The seller was great to work with, however the product did not function as promised. I was appreciative that I could get my money back in a timely manner.

Reviews.Title: George S.
Reviews.Author: George S.
Reviews.Content: We couldn't figure out how to get it working.  The company was responsive to our needs but they spoke in technical terms.  We got tired of trying to get it to work and just gave up.  We had already spent many hours trying to get it to work and just didn't feel it was worth the effort.

Reviews.Title: Buyers BE WARNED !
Reviews.Author: Far From Worth It
Reviews.Content: I own 4 of these. They are 'WaterProof' outdoor cameras....... Yeah, right ;)The power supplies Aren't!! (Are you kidding me?) NO! Not kidding!They burn out in the slightest rain...I actually wrapped them in electrical tape to keep the from dying now... and STILL, one of them fried in the last rainstorm...If you buy an outdoor 'waterproof' cam... get ready to laugh when your power supply fails every time that it rains and you have to buy a new one.It's not a 'fluke'  I won 4 and in 3 months have gone through 6 power supplies....What a joke!

Reviews.Title: This Camera doesnt work
Reviews.Author: G. Smallwood "GMS"
Reviews.Content: This is a copy of the letter I sent to Foscam and did not get an answer.This is a poor waist of your money don't waist your time or money get anything else but one of these.I have a Foscam FI8908W and a FI8904W neither one of them will work. I had the FI8908W working OK then all of a sudden the wireless quit working and it can no longer communicate wireless.  I upgraded the firmware but that did not work I am using Firmware 11.4.2.17 and web UI 2.4.8.14 and the camera works fine connected to the router  via Ethernet Cat 5 it just won't work wirelessly.  It does not detect a network when I scan for it through the set-up software.  I can't detect the camera when I scan for wireless devices.  I was using Firmware 11.14.1.46 which was original version.  It worked fine for about 3 months and then just quit working.  All of my other wireless cameras are working fine but they are Linksys.  I have also tried changing antennas with the FI8904W that didn't work either.The FI8904W is an indoor outdoor but it does not work outside because there is too much light.  I  have it in the shade but it still is too bright.  I have even used a black 12 inch (30 cm)  PVC pipe to make limit the light and that still does not work.  I can't turn down the brightness or contrast enough to really see anything.  It seems to work ok inside or at night just not outside during the daytime.I have not had very good luck with Foscam so far I hope these are problems that are easy to fix and the product is just an example of German precision.  I hope it is not poor design and a bad product.It is a horrible the German Engineering is poor.  Get anything else but not one of these

ProductInfo.Features:
Simple to setup, friendly GUI, remote viewing, record from anywhere anytime
Waterproof for outdoor installation, Auto IR-LED illumination for night vision up to 20 meters
Motion detection alert via email or upload image to FTP. Access management with password protection.
Supports all standard browsers and can be viewed remotely using smartphone software (not included)
Wi-Fi compliant with wireless standards IEEE 802.11b/g and supports both WEP & WPA WPA2 encryption
